entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Differences in DEB and RPM metadata #45126
  • Error treated as warning on dotnet sdk source build -> #45104

Closed

  • .NET Core SDK should generate appropriate RID graphs in an app's .deps.json file #1046
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add accidentally removed JS functions back #45124
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #45123
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #45120
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #45119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #45115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 to Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks #45100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove AspNET substraction logic #44995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Add .npmrc to prevent npmjs usage, even accidentally #45116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Increment branding to allow for post-GA hotfixes #44994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #45091
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #45094
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2589314 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities project property #45055
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45095
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix `Change failed to apply (error code: ...)` intermittent failures #45097
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent copy/paste of password and warn #44761
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
